display_name: Medical Outcomes Study SF-36: Have felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer you up
description:
Item from the Medical Outcomes Study Short Form 36 (SF-36). [Ware JE and Sherbourne CD, 1992 (PubMed ID: 1593914)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/1593914/)

Original question: *9. These questions are about how you feel and how things have been with you during the past 4 weeks. For each question, check the box for the one answer that comes closest to the way you have been feeling. During the past 4 weeks, how much of the time. f. Have you felt downhearted and blue?*

[Search for all SF-36 variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/shhs/variables?search=mossf36)
